org.forgerock.openidm.script

Interface ScriptCustomizer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractScriptedService, EndpointsService, InfoService, PolicyService

    public interface ScriptCustomizer
    A ScriptCustomizer allows an implementer to customize the script bindings per request.
